title: Projects
text: Below is a selection of academic and professional analytics projects that showcase my technical and business skill set.

title: Projects
text:
üìä Microbrewery Strategic & Quality Control Analysis
Skills: Python, Decision Trees, Monte Carlo Simulation, Linear Programming
- Built financial projections using decision tree models, break-even analysis, and risk quantification.
- Executed 1,000+ iteration Monte Carlo simulations to model microchip defect rates and quality control risks.
- Applied linear programming to optimize production schedules, reduce operating costs, and increase expected ROI.
- Developed a strategic launch plan for a Houston-based brewery with targeted marketing and operational alignment to seasonal demand.
:contentReferenceoaicite:3

title: Projects
text:
üö¢ Cruise Industry Market Analysis
Skills: Python, K-means clustering, Conjoint Analysis, A/B Testing
- Conducted exploratory data analysis to uncover cruise industry trends and port visit behaviors.
- Used K-means clustering to segment passenger demographics and identify target segments.
- Performed conjoint analysis and A/B tests to evaluate feature preferences for luxury cruise experiences.
:contentReferenceoaicite:4

title: Projects
text:
üß¨ Airbnb Market Analysis (Copenhagen)
Skills: Regression, PCA, Clustering, Classification (NB, KNN, Decision Trees)
- Cleaned and visualized thousands of Airbnb listings with geospatial mapping and pricing trend analysis.
- Built regression models (Adjusted R¬≤ = 0.572) to identify key price drivers and support pricing recommendations.
- Used PCA + K-means to segment listings and users; delivered insights for pricing strategy and value optimization.
:contentReferenceoaicite:5

title: Projects
text:
üß† Enterprise Analytics System (BU Symposium 2024)
Skills: Enterprise Architecture, AI/ML Systems, Blockchain Concepts
- Conducted research on AI-enabled Enterprise Analytics Systems (EAS) for innovation and operational efficiency.
- Proposed an enterprise architecture integrating ML, blockchain, and scalable data frameworks for SMEs.
- Highlighted policy alignment, digital transformation strategies, and workforce development.
:contentReferenceoaicite:6

title: Projects
text:

Skills: SQL (CTEs, Window Functions), Python (pandas), Matplotlib

- Used CTEs, ranking functions, and window functions to evaluate employee performance, monthly trends, and customer segments.
- Automated feature engineering and forecasting workflows; generated insights for sales optimization and inventory planning.
